app_name: Paper.io 2 for Android - Free App Download
about_section: Paper.io 2 is an arcade game developed by VOODOO. The APK has been available since September 2018 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 7.5 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 3.91 out of 5 stars, based on 2 million ratings. The last update of the app was on May 28, 2025 . Paper.io 2 has a content rating "Everyone" . Paper.io 2 has an APK download size of 107.04 MB and the latest version available is 4.15.1 . Designed for Android version 7.0+ . Paper.io 2 is FREE to download.
app_description:
Welcome to the next level of addictive and thrilling gameplay with Paper.io 2! Enter a colorful and dynamic world where strategy, skill, and cunning are your greatest allies. Prepare to embark on an epic journey of conquest as you strive to dominate the virtual realm and become the ultimate champion!
Paper.io 2 builds upon the success of its predecessor, delivering an even more exhilarating multiplayer experience that will keep you hooked for hours on end. Join millions of players from around the globe in real-time battles where every move counts. Are you ready to claim your place at the top of the leaderboard?
🏰 Conquer Territory: Expand your territory and assert your dominance over the battlefield. Strategize your moves to outmaneuver opponents and capture as much space as possible. But beware, as rivals will stop at nothing to thwart your plans!
🌎 Global Domination: Compete against players worldwide in intense multiplayer matches. Test your skills against the best and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate ruler of Paper.io 2. Will you emerge victorious?
💥 Power-Up Arsenal: Gain the upper hand in battle with a variety of powerful abilities and enhancements. From speed boosts to defensive shields, choose your power-ups wisely to gain a strategic advantage over your adversaries.
🤖 AI Challenges: Not in the mood for multiplayer? Take on challenging AI opponents in solo mode and hone your skills to perfection. Can you beat the computer and prove your mastery of the game?
🎨 Customization: Express yourself with skins, themes, and avatars to choose from. Whether you're a fierce warrior or a playful prankster, there's a look for every style. Show off your personality and stand out from the crowd!
🏆 Achievements and Rewards: Unlock achievements and earn rewards as you progress through the game. From exclusive skins to in-game currency, there are plenty of incentives to keep you coming back for more.
🎮 Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: With simple controls and addictive gameplay, Paper.io 2 is easy to pick up for players of all skill levels. However, mastering the art of territory conquest will require cunning strategy and razor-sharp reflexes.
🎉 Endless Entertainment: With dynamic gameplay and endless possibilities, there's never a dull moment in Paper.io 2. From epic battles to hilarious mishaps, you'll be laughing, cheering, and rolling your way to victory!
👑 Become the Legend: Rise from a mere contender to a legendary champion as you conquer more territory and outsmart your opponents. Leave your mark on the virtual world of Paper.io 2 and etch your name into the annals of history.
Join the millions of players already hooked on Paper.io 2 and experience the thrill of conquest like never before. Whether you're a casual gamer looking for some quick fun or a competitive strategist seeking a challenge, Paper.io 2 offers something for everyone. Download now and embark on your quest for domination!
Recent changes:
We’ve made improvements to enhance your Paper.io 2 experience! This update includes optimizations, bug fixes and other enhancements to keep the game smooth and fun. Enjoy!
